lead_paragraph: Julio Velasquez is accused of second-degree murder in the death of Herbert Burgess, who the police say argued with the suspect’s daughter over a MetroCard swipe.

headline.main: Man Arrested in Fatal Stabbing at Harlem Subway Station

snippet: Julio Velasquez is accused of second-degree murder in the death of Herbert Burgess, who the police say argued with the suspect’s daughter over a MetroCard swipe.
abstract: Julio Velazquez is charged with second-degree murder in March stabbing death of Herbert Burgess in Harlem subway station.
